title: Fall Guy
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Nets' failures, Pelicans-Suns, 'unfortunate typo' voicemails!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones discusses who is at fault for the Nets as they falter against the Celtics (1:15), and whether or not the level of play from the Pelicans we are currently seeing means they "won" the Anthony Davis trade (14:04). Plus, an IYHH including Elon Musk's attempts to take mankind to Mars (24:28), and your voicemails from "unfortunate" typos that you have made in the past (37:01)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @graceihle on Elon Musk saying life on Mars won't be luxurious: https://bit.ly/3KgY9km
  2. @jcljules on the forgotten movement to reclaim Africa’s stolen art: https://bit.ly/37BrZDf
  3. @mrMattSimon says that the oceans aren’t just warming—their soundscapes are transforming: https://bit.ly/3LbJw3c
